alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 5:22PM CDT until April 18 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam affecting Juneau and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:10 PM CDT Friday the flow was 35,171.0 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 5:10 PM CDT Friday was 35,198.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday evening and continue falling to 21,600.0 cfs Friday morning. - Flood flow is 30,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening.
